subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fellow Spaniard Juan Carlos Ferrero ended Rafael Nadal’s 81-game clay winning streak by beating him 7-5, 6-1 in the second round of the Rome Masters.
snippet: Fellow Spaniard Juan Carlos Ferrero ended Rafael Nadal’s 81-game clay winning streak by beating him 7-5, 6-1 in the second round of the Rome Masters.
